title: Ethereum Cat Herders Meeting #75
body:
## Date and Time

Jan 04, 2022, at 15:00 UTC

## Location 

Zoom: https://us02web.zoom.us/j/84834303064?pwd=YTVDNUxvSjEzL1VTOXNoNmI1a2RlZz09

Video at YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCD9iiIwTRtLDYcEWONs2Q3A

## Agenda

New users on ECH Discord and/or contributor's introduction

### 1. Network upgrade  
- [The Merge](https://ethereumcatherders.com/the_merge/)â€Š

### 2. ECH updates
- [Review 2021: The Ethereum Cat Herders](https://medium.com/ethereum-cat-herders/review-2021-the-ethereum-cat-herders-9103b0c8d0f9)
- [ECH website updating](https://github.com/ethereum-cat-herders/ech-website-v2/issues)
- [ECH engineering](https://github.com/ethereum-cat-herders/PM/issues/245) 
- [Cat blazers](https://medium.com/ethereum-cat-herders/catblazer-chronicles-nov-21-224cae682df3)
- [EIP Insight](https://hackmd.io/@poojaranjan/EthereumImprovementProposalsInsight)
- [PEEPanEIP](https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL4cwHXAawZxqu0PKKyMzG_3BJV_xZTi1F)  - **Upcoming** meetings can be found on [PEEPanEIP schedule](https://github.com/ethereum-cat-herders/PM/projects/2)

- [Meeting notes](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1axM1KaKc-GCcoPbAnYTOhgLnxXsBVoO5XRjTN3CLnck/edit#gid=0) and action items for ECH 
  - All Core Dev meeting [128](https://github.com/ethereum/pm/blob/33dd3683c7e64c88b8f8b53f7c51c8e4ee15cb07/AllCoreDevs-Meetings/Meeting%20128.md)
  - Consensus meeting 78 - No recording/ [Ben's notes](https://hackmd.io/@benjaminion/HyxWQTdqY)
  - EIP Improvement Process meeting [46 notes](https://github.com/ethereum-cat-herders/EIPIP/blob/949fdd9574539e126c4db4c51f06368ad2e122a3/All%20EIPIP%20Meetings/Meeting%20046.md)
 - Post-merge MEV breakout room [meeting notes](https://github.com/ethereum/pm/blob/master/Breakout-Room/Post-Merge-MEV.md) 

### 3. Events & hackathon
- [Devcon 6](https://blog.ethereum.org/2021/12/13/announcing-devconnect/) will take place in the first half of Q4-2022 in Bogota, Colombia.
- [Devconnect](https://devconnect.org/) Amsterdam, Netherlands April 2022
- [ETHDENVER 2022](https://www.ethdenver.com) - FEBRUARY 11-20
- [SCHELLING P0INT](https://schellingpoint.gitcoin.co/) - February 17, 2022  
### 4. New initiatives / brainstorming
- ECH Medium to Mirror 
- ECH  video
- Learn and Earn

### 5. ECH funding
- Funding via [Gitcoin Round 12](https://gitcoin.co/grants/782/ethereum-cat-herders-community-fund), CLR & [Moloch](https://twitter.com/MolochDAO/status/1472966722453835781)

### 6. Discuss and close the ECH GitHub Issues/PRs
- [ethereum-cat-herders/PM](https://github.com/ethereum-cat-herders/PM/issues)
- [ethereum-cat-herders/funding](https://github.com/ethereum-cat-herders/funding/issues)

### 7. Review of outstanding action items from previous ECH meetings
- [Meeting 74](https://github.com/ethereum-cat-herders/PM/blob/master/All%20Ethereum%20Cat%20Herder%20Meetings/Meeting%20074.md)


 Anything else?
#### The date for the next meeting - Jan 18, 2022.
